Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: The new low level will return consistent results

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: ~harrisob@us.ibm.com Don't know anything about the new low level stuff, will it continue to work with a 1.4 fabric network ? If it doesn't then we need a solution for the current impl that supports 1.4. If it does then will applications continue to work unchanged irrespective on whether they use discovery ?
